item.title: 21st Century Witch
item.description: Archived from the original article here When the light shifted just right, the ceramic tiles and concrete footpaths twinkled like water off the back of a swan. 16th Century witches could build a hut in the woods and forage for herbs; 21st Century witches were susceptible to modernist persuasions. The Demotic Meeting Hall was constructed twenty years prior as the main meeting hall of the National Dockworkerâ€™s Union.
